name: Soulatorio
description:
Soulatorio is a rhythm game that incorporates vertical scroll and 2D platformer mechanics to tell the tragic life story of several uncomprehended characters. With uncanny music for the usual standards of the genre, spooky hand drawn art style and different rhythms to follow simultaneously, you must help the souls of these poor individuals escape through the trauma filled purgatory and reach the light to earn them their happy ending.

Dev Team

  • Gabriel Shimabuko Yamashiro
  • Kenny Hideki Nagahama Uyehara
  • Luis Alberto Llacza Bustos https://dradxv.itch.io/
  • Mariana Yasmin Paz Chuquihuanca
  • Alvaro Francisco Flores Guerra Arrieta
  • Lucero Melanie Pacheco Marreros

Outsourcing

  • Enrique de los Rios (music)
  • Luciana Isenrich (art)
